code: import{FORGET_USER,FORGET_USER_SUCCESSFUL,FORGET_PASSWORD_API_FAILED}from'./actionTypes';export var forgetUser=function forgetUser(user,history){return{type:FORGET_USER,payload:{user:user,history:history}};};export var forgetUserSuccessful=function forgetUserSuccessful(message){return{type:FORGET_USER_SUCCESSFUL,payload:message};};export var userForgetPasswordError=function userForgetPasswordError(error){return{type:FORGET_PASSWORD_API_FAILED,payload:error};};
